input_email_body:
Subject: 

Dear Customer Support, I am reporting an unexpected system downtime that occurred during the data analytics processing for investment optimization My name is Sophia Rossi.. It is possible that the issue might be due to recent software updates or server overload. Despite our attempts to restart the services and roll back the updates, the problem continues to persist You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.. I would greatly appreciate if you could look into this matter urgently and provide a solution to get the systems back online. This downtime is significantly impacting our operations and delaying the resolution is not feasible.
